data.lyric:
[ti:Rockstar Chainz (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:Pluto x Baby Pluto (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rockstar Chainz (Explicit) - Future
[00:01.57]Yeah
[00:06.06]One of the realest s**t I ever
[00:07.37]Torey I know what to do with this
[00:08.63]S**t you know what I'm sayin'
[00:11.27]Yeah you know how I'm kickin' it
[00:13.95]Rockstar chain all the way to the floor dawg
[00:16.21]Ain't tryna be cool with no rap n***a I'm f**kin' they ho dawg
[00:19.59]Took two Addys then counted an M and d**n near dozed off
[00:22.95]I'm in the stars drivin' myself I feel like autopilot
[00:26.87]Designer Goyard bucket I'm my own stylist
[00:29.83]I done made it out the streets my brothers still wildin'
[00:33.02]Had to go Draco Draco Draco all I could do about it
[00:36.48]Soon as it come my way I can't do nothin' but see about it
[00:39.67]I'ma get me a B up out it started with a milli'
[00:43.01]Made it out the trenches I can't ever plead guilty
[00:46.39]Crushed her heart when she found out I crushed her friend
[00:49.78]Played it smart 'cause either way I gotta win
[00:53.15]I wear my heart on my sleeve they ain't real as me
[00:56.55]We could've kept it way more cordial but it's chemistry
[01:00.05]You kept me over through the night and boost my energy
[01:03.32]I'm thankin' you I'm thankin' me for curiosity
[01:06.83]Coolest thing to do is to be cool with a n***a
[01:08.85]And f**kin' on his n***a
[01:10.18]I know n***as'd do it to me so I'm always gon' send that hit
[01:13.48]She said she true and she said she loyal
[01:15.08]That's how they come to me
[01:16.60]I know what really turn you on and I'ma keep our secret
[01:20.93]Rockstar chain all the way to the floor dawg
[01:23.51]Ain't tryna be cool with no rap n***a I'm f**kin' they ho dawg
[01:26.73]Took two Addys then counted an M and d**n near dozed off
[01:30.14]I'm in the stars drivin' myself I feel like autopilot
[01:34.01]Designer Goyard bucket I'm my own stylist
[01:36.99]I done made it out the streets my brothers still wildin'
[01:40.16]Had to go Draco Draco Draco all I could do about it
[01:43.45]Soon as it come my way I can't do nothin' but see about it
[01:46.96]Started with a million dollars go 'head and get me billi'
[01:50.17]I'm from the trenches so the clip least hold a fifty
[01:53.44]Crushed ice Cartier frames or Chrome Hearts
[01:56.78]N***as ain't solid as they claim so I play it smart
[02:00.30]I'm changin' weather I'm thinkin' better I'm peepin' the energy
[02:03.66]I left my heart in the streets so ain't no sympathy
[02:06.95]If you ain't with me you against me you the enemy
[02:10.30]Playin' my cards sittin' in the stars this the life I lead
[02:13.77]Coolest thing you could do is squash the beef and still send a hit
[02:17.17]I know n***as'd do it to me so I ain't gon' never stop a blitz
[02:20.53]She say it's loyalty no betrayal when it come to me
[02:23.64]I know what really turn you on and I'ma keep a secret
[02:28.24]Rockstar chain all the way to the floor dawg
[02:30.48]Ain't tryna be cool with no rap n***a I'm f**kin' they ho dawg
[02:33.88]Took two Addys then counted an M and d**n near dozed off
[02:37.31]I'm in the stars drivin' myself I feel like autopilot
[02:41.22]Designer Goyard bucket I'm my own stylist
[02:44.09]I done made it out the streets my brothers still wildin'
[02:47.44]Had to go Draco Draco Draco all I could do about it
[02:50.76]Soon as it come my way I can't do nothin' but see about it
data.trans:
[ti:Rockstar Chainz (Explicit)]
[ar:Future]
[al:Pluto x Baby Pluto (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.57]//
[00:06.06]我见过最实在的人之一
[00:07.37]Torey Montana制作
[00:08.63]你懂我什么意思吧
[00:11.27]你知道我有多兴奋
[00:13.95]摇滚明星的金链子 长及地面 兄弟
[00:16.21]不想和任何说唱歌手友好相待 我要抢了他们的女人 兄弟
[00:19.59]来两片那种东西 然后数一百万 我差点睡着了
[00:22.95]我飞上了星空 感觉我是个宇航员
[00:26.87]戴着戈雅渔夫帽 我就是自己的造型师
[00:29.83]我已经从街头闯出来 我的兄弟依然很疯狂
[00:33.02]必须掏出枪来 只有这样 我才能解决问题
[00:36.48]问题出现在我面前 我就只能着手处理
[00:39.67]我要挣个十亿 先挣一百万
[00:43.01]从贫民窟闯出来 我永远不能认罪
[00:46.39]当她发现我和她朋友勾搭上了 她心碎一地
[00:49.78]聪明行事 不管怎样 我得赢
[00:53.15]我从不掩饰我的真心 他们没有我这样实在
[00:56.55]我们本来可以友好相待 但是化学反应没法阻挡
[01:00.05]你整夜陪伴着我 让我精力充沛
[01:03.32]我谢谢你 我也谢谢好奇的自己
[01:06.83]最酷的事情就是和一个朋友很要好
[01:08.85]然后抢了他的女人
[01:10.18]我知道有些人会这样对我 所以我始终开枪不留情
[01:13.48]她说她认真的 她说她忠心不二
[01:15.08]她们来的时候都这样
[01:16.60]我知道怎样让你快乐 我会保守我们的秘密
[01:20.93]摇滚明星的金链子 长及地面 兄弟
[01:23.51]不想和任何说唱歌手友好相待 我要抢了他们的女人 兄弟
[01:26.73]来两片那种东西 然后数一百万 我差点睡着了
[01:30.14]我飞上了星空 感觉我是个宇航员
[01:34.01]戴着戈雅渔夫帽 我就是自己的造型师
[01:36.99]我已经从街头闯出来 我的兄弟依然很疯狂
[01:40.16]必须掏出枪来 只有这样 我才能解决问题
[01:43.45]问题出现在我面前 我就只能着手处理
[01:46.96]先挣一百万 然后去挣十个亿
[01:50.17]我来自贫民窟 所以我的弹夹至少能装五十发子弹
[01:53.44]漂亮的钻石 卡地亚眼镜 或者Chrome Hearts项链
[01:56.78]那些人没有他们说的那样坚定 所以我得放聪明点
[02:00.30]我呼风唤雨 我的想法更成熟 我看得懂大家的状态
[02:03.66]我把我的心都交给了街头 所以没有同情心
[02:06.95]如果你不是我一伙的 那你就是我的对手 你是我的敌人
[02:10.30]做好我自己的事 坐在豪车里 这就是我的生活
[02:13.77]你能做的最酷的事就是 冰释前嫌之后 还是扣下扳机
[02:17.17]我知道有些人会这样对我 所以我不会放下武器
[02:20.53]她说她忠贞不渝 绝对不会背叛我
[02:23.64]我知道怎样让你快乐 我会保守秘密
[02:28.24]摇滚明星的金链子 长及地面 兄弟
[02:30.48]不想和任何说唱歌手友好相待 我要抢了他们的女人 兄弟
[02:33.88]来两片那种东西 然后数一百万 我差点睡着了
[02:37.31]我飞上了星空 感觉我是个宇航员
[02:41.22]戴着戈雅渔夫帽 我就是自己的造型师
[02:44.09]我已经从街头闯出来 我的兄弟依然很疯狂
[02:47.44]必须掏出枪来 只有这样 我才能解决问题
[02:50.76]问题出现在我面前 我就只能着手处理
